node.excerpt: Songwang.io is a fast, simple blog, i like it, use it.  https://github.com/wangsongiam Install gatsby Songwang.io developed by gatsby…

internal.content:
Songwang.io is a fast, simple blog, i like it, use it. 

[https://github.com/wangsongiam](https://github.com/wangsongiam)

## Install

```
git clone https://github.com/wangsongiam/songwang.io.git
cd songwang.io
npm install
gatsby develop
```

## gatsby

Songwang.io developed by gatsby, Gatsby is a framework for Build blazing fast modern beautiful secure apps and websites with React。

## gatsby-config.js

Site configuration file. You can configure most settings here.

## theme 

theme configuration file is _config.yml。

### styled-components

styling React component 

##  GraphQL

GraphQL 既是一种用于 API 的查询语言也是一个满足你数据查询的运行时。

## Plugins

600多个插件

## Showcase

393 Sites

node.excerpt: Hexo is A fast, simple & powerful blog framework。由万能的js语言开发，可方便利用最强大的js生态。 Hexo专注于blog，部署方便。 https://hexo.io/ Install _config.yml Site…

internal.content:
Hexo is A fast, simple & powerful blog framework。由万能的js语言开发，可方便利用最强大的js生态。

Hexo专注于blog，部署方便。

[https://hexo.io/](https://hexo.io/)

## Install

```
npm install hexo-cli -g
hexo init blog
cd blog
npm install
hexo server
```

## _config.yml

Site configuration file. You can configure most settings here.

## package.json

Application data. The EJS, Stylus and Markdown renderers are installed by default。通过js的插件，可以支持所有Template，Styles.

## Plugins

具有200多个插件

## Themes

200多个模板

node.excerpt: Jekyll是ruby开发的，具有Simple、Static、Blog-aware等特点。 Jekyll已成为静态blog的标准，模板丰富，其他语言的博客，如Hexo、Gatsby blog等，都参照Jekyll设计理念。 Jekyll is the engine behind…

internal.content:
Jekyll是ruby开发的，具有Simple、Static、Blog-aware等特点。

Jekyll已成为静态blog的标准，模板丰富，其他语言的博客，如Hexo、Gatsby blog等，都参照Jekyll设计理念。

Jekyll is the engine behind GitHub Pages。

[https://jekyllrb.com/](https://jekyllrb.com/)


## Philosophy

Jekyll does what you tell it to do — no more, no less. [Philosophy](https://jekyllrb.com/philosophy/)

## Liquid

Jekyll uses the Liquid templating language to process templates.{{ variable }} .

## Front Matter

```
layout: post
title: Blogging Like a Hacker
```

## Set Blog
_config.yml.

## Add A New Post

To add a new post, simply add a file in the _posts directory that follows the convention YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext and includes the necessary front matter.

node.excerpt: 记笔记是一种学习的好方式，本人上github7、8年了，没有什么像样的东东，惭愧之余清空了，重新出发，从博客开始。 静态blog已流行多年，实现的技术从Jekyll，Hexo，到Gatsby： （1）Jekyll，ruby技术，静态，专注blog，模板多，Rubyist…

internal.content:
记笔记是一种学习的好方式，本人上github7、8年了，没有什么像样的东东，惭愧之余清空了，重新出发，从博客开始。

静态blog已流行多年，实现的技术从Jekyll，Hexo，到Gatsby：


（1）Jekyll，ruby技术，静态，专注blog，模板多，Rubyist首选。


（2）Hexo，js技术，静态，专注blog，模板多，成熟，Jsist首选。


（3）Gatsby，React、GraphQL技术的开发框架。

   我在Gatsby showcase中选择songwang的blog模板，类Jekyll，简洁，tag，全文搜索，[open sourced](https://github.com/wangsongiam/songwang.io).

node.excerpt: Hello, my name is Zhong Zhun. I am a full-stack software engineer at  CCCCOI , living in  Chendu , Mudanjiang , Rongchang , Wuhan , zhuhai…

internal.content:
Hello, my name is Zhong Zhun.

I am a full-stack software engineer at [CCCCOI](http://www.ccccoi.com/), living in ~~Chendu~~,~~Mudanjiang~~,~~Rongchang~~,~~Wuhan~~,~~zhuhai~~, ~~Nanjing~~, ~~Wuhan~~,  Sanya.

I code Php, Javascript, and Python.


## About zputee.github.io

This is my blog site. It was built with  Gatsby. It's also coded in the functional paradigm and fully [open sourced](https://github.com/wangsongiam/songwang.io).
